data.title: Movie Theater Schedule
data.text:
08/03 - 08/09

Movie times and titles subject to change without notice.

SATURDAY

9:00 AM:

Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch has a Glitch (2005) PG – 65 Min – Animation, Comedy, Drama - A malfunction threatens to destroy stitch and his friendship with Lilo.

11:00 AM:

Clifford the Big Red Dog (2021) PG – 96 Min – Animation, Adventure, Comedy – Darby Camp, Jack Whitehall, Blaise Hemingway– A Young girls love for a tiny puppy named Clifford makes the dog grow to an enormous size.

3:00 PM:

Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone (2001) PG – 145 Min – Adventure, Family, Fantasy – Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson - Rescued from the outrageous neglect from his aunt and uncle a young boy with great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

7:00 PM:

Jurassic World Dominion (2022) PG-13 – 147 Min – Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi –Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Derek Connolly - Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live-and hunt- alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with dinosaurs.

9:30 PM:

Doctor Strange (2016) PG-13 -115 Min –Action, Adventure, Fantasy – Bebedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams - While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

SUNDAY

9:00 AM:

Frozen (2013) PG -102 Min– Animation, Adventure, Comedy - Fearless optimist Anna teams up with Kristoff in an epic journey, encountering Everest-like conditions and a hilarious snowman named Olaf in a race to find Anna's sister Elsa.

11:00 AM:

Walking With Dinosaurs (2013) PG – 87 Min– Animation, Adventure, Comedy - See and feel what it was like when dinosaurs ruled the Earth, in a story where an underdog dino triumphs to become a hero for the ages.

3:00 PM:

Avatar (2009) PG-13 – 162 Min – Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi – Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver – A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

7:00 PM:

Beetlejuice (1988)- PG – 92 Min – Comedy, Fantasy – Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder - The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, then they hire a malicious spirit to drive them out

9:30 PM:

Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (2022) PG-13 – 126 Min – Action, Adventure, Fantasy - Bebedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen, Chiwetel Ejiofor – Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams who can travel across multiverses, to battle multiple threats, including other0universe versions of himself, which threaten to wipe out millions across the multiverse.

MONDAY

9:00 AM:

Trolls (2016) PG – 92 Min – Animation, Adventure, Comedy - After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

11:00 AM:

Megamind (2010) PG – 95 Min –Animation, Action, Comedy - Super villain Megamind's dreams have come true when he conquers the city's protector, Metro Man, gaining control of Metro City. But when a new villain is created and chaos runs rampant, the world's biggest "mind" and his comic sidekick, Minion, might actually save the day.

3:00 PM:

Tangled (2010) PG – 100 Min – Animation, Adventure, Comedy - When the kingdom’s most wanted – and most charming – bandit Flynn Rider hides in a mysterious tower, the last thing he expects to find is Rapunzel, a spirited teen with an unlikely super power – 70 feet of magical golden hair!

7:00 PM:

Avatar: The Way of the Water (2023) PG-13– 192 Min - Action, Adventure, Fantasy – Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver – Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Once aq familiar threat returns to finiswh what was previously started. Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of Na’vi race to protect their planet.

10:30 PM:

I Feel Pretty (2018) PG-13 110 Min – Comedy, Romance – Amy Schumer, Michelle Williams, Tom Hopper - A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful capable woman on the planet her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly

TUESDAY

9:00 AM:

Gnomeo & Juliet (2011) G -84 Min – Animation, Adventure, Comedy - Caught up in a feud between neighbors, Gnomeo and Juliet must overcome as many obstacles as their namesakes.

11:00 AM:

Hotel Transylvania 3 (2018) PG – 97 Min –Animation, Adventure, Comedy - Join your favorite monster family as they embark on a vacation adventure on a luxury monster cruise ship.

3:00 PM:

Apollo 13 (1995) PG – 135 Min – Adventure, Drama, History – Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton, Kevin Bacon – Based off real events of one of the worst NASA tragedy’s. In 1971 NASA plans to send out people to the Moon for a lunar mission. They have chosen astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise, and Jack Swigert.

7:00 PM:

Moana (2016) PG -93 Min – Animated, Adventure, Musical – Auli’I Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Nicole Scherzinger – An adventures teenager sails out on a daring mission to save her people. During her journey, Moana meets the once-mighty demigold Maui, who guides her in her quest to become a master way-finder. Together they sail across the open ocean on an action-packed voyage.

9:30 PM:

Hunger Games, The (2012) PG-13 – 142 Min – Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi – Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth - Every year in the ruins of was once North America, the Capitol of the nation of Panem forces each of its twelve districts to send a teenage boy and girl to compete in the Hunger Games

WEDNESDAY

9:00 AM:

Rio (2011) G – 96 Min – Animation, Comedy, Adventure - When Blu meets Jewel they take off on an adventure to Rio De Janerio

11:00 AM:

Secret Life of Pets, The (2016) PG – 87 Min –Animation, Adventure, Comedy - The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

3:00 PM:

Elvis (2022) PG-13 – 159 Min – Biography, Drama, Music – Baz Luhrmann, Sam Bromell, Craig Pearce – From childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager Colonel Tom Parker.

7:00 PM:

$$ Family Fun Magic & Comedy Show

Join us for an enchanting evening of family entertainment with the Michael Van Ness Family Fun Magic & Comedy Show. Prepare for a night filled with laughter and wonder suitable for all ages. Secure your tickets conveniently at the activities desk or online at www.michaelvanness.com. Advance tickets are priced at $10.00, with door sales available at $15.00.

8:30 PM:

$$ Adult Stand-up Comedy Show 18+

Invite your friends for an evening of laughter and entertainment at Michael Van Ness's dynamic comedy show. Hosted by Michael Van Ness, this unforgettable performance promises an engaging experience that will leave a lasting impression. Tickets are available for purchase at the activities desk or conveniently online at www.michaelvanness.com. Secure your spot for this exclusive event at the discounted rate of $10.00 in advance. Please note, this is an adult-oriented show with explicit language, rated PG-18

THURSDAY

9:00 AM:

Rio 2 (2014) G – 101 Min- -Animation, Adventure, Comedy - Blu and Jewel migrate with their 3 kids from Rio to the Amazon whereBlu gets to meet his Father in law

11:00 AM:

Secret Life of Pets 2, The (2019) PG – 87 MIn –Animation, Adventure, Comedy - Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.

3:00 PM:

Bad Guys, The (2022) PG- 100 Min – Animation, Family, Comedy- Mr. Wolf, Mr. Snake, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Mr. Tarantula are the infamous Bad Guys! After years of countless heists and being the world’s most wanted villains, the gang is finally caught. The Bad Guys set out to fool the world into believing they’ve gone good.

7:00 PM:

Transformers: Rise of the Beast (2023) – 127 Min – Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi – Anthony Ramon, Dominique Fishback, Luna Lauren Velez – During the 90’s a new faction of Transformers – The Maximals – Join the autobots as allies in the battle for earth.

9:30 PM:

White House Down (2013) PG-13 – 131 Min–Action, Drama, Thriller – Jamie Foxx, Channing Tatum, Maggie Gyllenhaal - While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

FRIDAY

9:00 AM:

Toy Story 3 (2010) G – 103 Min – Animation, Adventure, Comedy - Andy is now 17 and preparing to leave for college. He has not played with his toys for years. Woddy, Buzz Lightyear, and other toys are accidently donated to a daycare center by Andy’s mother, and the toys must decide where their loyalties lie

3:00 PM:

Hidden Figures (2016) PG – 129 Min – Biography, Drama, History - Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae– An upbeat, inspiring tale about the role three African-American women played in the NASA program during the early 60's.

7:00 PM:

Super Mario Bros Movie, The (2023) PG – 93 Min – Animation, Adventure, Comedy – Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Day – A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

9:30 PM:
